entries: You can use Dark One's Own Luck more often than normal.
You can use Dark One's Own Luck one additional time between rests.

optionalfeature.name: Extra Entropic Ward
entries: You can use Entropic Ward more often than normal.
You can use Entropic Ward one additional time between rests.

optionalfeature.name: Extra Fey Presence
entries: You can use Fey Presence more often than normal.
You can use Fey Presence one additional time between rests.

optionalfeature.name: Extra Invocation
entries: You have knowledge of more invocations compared to others.
Your total known Invocations is increased by 1. You can retake this talent one additional time only.

optionalfeature.name: Improved Dark One's Blessing
entries: You gain more from your Dark One's Blessing than normal.

Aside from the temporary hit points you gain when you reduce a hostile creature to 0 hit points, your proficiency bonus is also temporarily increased by 1 until the end of your next turn. This effect does not stack.

optionalfeature.name: Improved Misty Escape
entries: You can avoid damage when you use Misty Escape.
When you use Misty Escape, the damage you received is reduced by half.

optionalfeature.name: Pernicious Magic
entries: Dark magic makes your spells harder to counter and dispel.
Your spells are treated as two levels higher when they become the target of counter spells and dispel magic.

optionalfeature.name: Arcane Tradition Focus
entries: The spells from the school of your chosen Arcane Tradition is harder to resist than normal.
Increase the DC of the spells from the school of your chosen Arcane Tradition by 1.

optionalfeature.name: Arcane Tradition Prodigy
entries: You are more practiced and naturally talented in the school of your Arcane Tradition. You can cast more spells from your school of tradition more often than normal.

Choose a spell of 3rd level or below from your spellbook that is under your school of your Arcane Tradition. You always have this spell prepared, it does not count against the number of spells you have prepared, and you can cast it once at its standard level without expending a spell slot. When you do so, you can not do so again until you finish a short or long rest.

optionalfeature.name: Greater Arcane Recovery
entries: You can regain higher magical energy than normal when studying your spellbook.
You can use Arcane Recovery to recover spell slots of up to 6th level.

optionalfeature.name: Improved Arcane Recovery
entries: You regain more of your magical energy than normal when studying your spellbook.
The spell slots you can recover is increased to two-thirds of your wizard's level.

optionalfeature.name: Improved Arcane Ward
entries: Your Arcane Ward is more potent than normal.
The hit points of your Arcane Ward is increased to thrice your Wizard's level + twice your Intelligence modifier.

optionalfeature.name: Improved Grim Harvest
entries: You gain more benefits from your Grim Harvest than normal.

Aside from the temporary hit points you gain when you kill a creature with a spell of 1st level or higher, your proficiency bonus is also temporarily increased by 1 until the end of your next turn. This effect does not stack.

optionalfeature.name: Improved Instinctive Charm
entries: Your Instinctive Charm is more potent than normal.
You can choose the attacker's target when there are multiple creatures closest.

optionalfeature.name: Improved Portent
entries: You are better in reading the future compared to others.
Increase the number of d20s you roll by 1. When you gain Greater Portent at 14th level, you roll four d20s.

optionalfeature.name: Improved Sculpt Spell
entries: You can choose more creatures than normal when you use Scult Spell.
Increase the number of creatures you can choose to 1 + your Intelligence modifier + the spell's level.

optionalfeature.name: Improved Benign Transposition
entries: You can use Benign Transposition even if it is not your turn.
You can use your reaction to invoke Benign Transposition.
Once you use this feature, you can't use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

optionalfeature.name: Swift Illusion Spell
entries: You are an expert in the school of illusion that you can sometimes cast certain low level illusion spells without effort.
You can take a bonus action to cast a cantrip or a 2nd level spell or below from the school of Illusion.
Wenn Sie diese Funktion verwenden, können Sie sie erst wieder nach einer kurzen oder langen Pause einsetzen.

optionalfeature.name: Swift Transmutation Spell
entries: You are an expert in the school of transmutation that you can sometimes cast certain low level transmutation spells without effort.
You can take a bonus action to cast a cantrip or a 2nd level spell or below from the school of Transmutation.
Wenn Sie diese Funktion verwenden, können Sie sie erst wieder nach einer kurzen oder langen Pause einsetzen.
